com.asm.widget.codeedit

Class ScrollingEditText

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.asm.widget.codeedit.ScrollingTextView
        • com.asm.widget.codeedit.ScrollingEditText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.GestureDetector.OnGestureListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, TextData.OnInvalidateListener, TextsDrawingInterface, TextViewInterface, java.lang.CharSequence
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CodeEdit

    public class ScrollingEditText
extends ScrollingTextView
    Flexible text editing view for android. You can customize almost anything.

    • Field Detail

      • CURSOR_INVISIBLE

        public static final int CURSOR_INVISIBLE
        this shows that cursor is currently invisible.
        See Also:
        getCursorMode(), Constant Field Values

      • CURSOR_SINGLE

        public static final int CURSOR_SINGLE
        cursor is single count. You can get it by getCursorPosition().
        See Also:
        getCursorMode(), Constant Field Values

      • CURSOR_SELECT

        public static final int CURSOR_SELECT
        cursor is couple count and selecting some text. You can get cursor position by getCursorPosition(int index).
        See Also:
        ScrollingEditText#getCursorPosition(int), Constant Field Values

      • CURSOR_LEFT

        public static final int CURSOR_LEFT
        shows the first cursor. On mode CURSOR_SINGLE, return cursor position. On mode CURSOR_SELECT, return left cursor position.
        See Also:
        getCursorMode(), Constant Field Values

      • CURSOR_RIGHT

        public static final int CURSOR_RIGHT
        shows the second cursor. On mode CURSOR_SINGLE, throws exception. On mode CURSOR_SELECT, return right cursor position.
        See Also:
        getCursorMode(), Constant Field Values
